response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. However, I understand that sometimes, finding the right price point can be challenging. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $11,000. This price not only represents a significant saving for you but also allows us to fairly compensate for the investment and value we've put into creating this product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
